title: Growing agriculture with big data: Alex Ball Meat & Livestock Australia

tasks.task: Present a shift from visual to information-driven livestock management.
subtasks: Discuss the impact of sensors and technology on farm operations.
Explain the transition from visual to data-driven decision-making for producers.
Highlight the role of advanced genetics and genomics in livestock businesses.
Address the challenge of integrating various agricultural enterprises (livestock, cropping, pasture, soil) into a cohesive system.
Explore the implications of data overload on producer decision-making.
Advocate for open-source platforms and democratization of algorithms for effective data utilization.
